subject: Investing
title: Location, Location, Location
description: A quick, practical guide to Location, Location, Location.

hook.text: Two identical houses, same builder, same year. One is worth twice the other today.

buildup.text: The only difference: one sits near a top school district; the other is thirty miles away.

discovery.text: Demand, schools, transit, and job growth drive local prices far more than the building itself.

twist.text: A new tech campus announced nearby can boost home values 15% before a single brick is laid.

climax.text: Savvy investors study migration patterns and infrastructure plans before choosing a zip code.

punchline.text: You can renovate a house, but you can't move its location.

quiz.question: What factor most influences property value differences for identical buildings?
